topSection.title: I’m Lixing SUN
topSection.subtitle: A Developer/Consultant based in China.
topSection.paragraph: Have 7 years of software development experience. While focusing more on frontend, also have practical experience in backend development, architecture design and DevOps. Experienced in E2E products from idea to release. Have deep understanding of Agile development, with rich experience of leading Agile team. A motivated, resonsible, team-oriented fast learner with strong can-do attitude.

content.title: Travel
content.content: I pretty enjoy travel with my family. It makes me keep experiencing new sight and culture, also meet new people with different background. It also help me get out of the urban life and get closer to nature.

content.title: Drawing
content.content: Influenced by my parents, I started learning drawing when I was a child. I have experienced various type of drawing such as traditional Chinese painting and oil painting. It does help me keep improving the aesthetics and stay creative. Recent years I start interested in pixel art and enjoy making some pieces with Procreate on iPad or Aseprite on PC.

content.title: Esports
content.content: Video game is my favorite way of having fun since very young. I enjoy every single journey which is full of uncertainty especially with friends, or diving into the fantastic worlds that game producers design. For my favorite Esports game TFT (Teamfight Tactics), I enjoy playing against the top players in China or even in the world. I have even attended a few competitions and luckily won some prizes including championship.
